N1.Q: USA gam ii zuih thukhun Upadi thupi pen bang hiam?

N2.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi in bangteng vaan hiam?
N2.A: Gam-uk ding kumpi phut, Ki-ukzia ding geel, Americans miteâ€™ septheih leh ngahtheih peuhmah peelhem saklo (protects)

N3.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi sungah ei leh ei ki-ukzia ding lamlak kammal thumte bang hiam?

N5.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi sungah Puahphat masakna sawmte bang kici hiam?

N6.Q: Tua Puahphat Masakna ah hamphatna ahihkeh suahtakna khat bang ahia?
N6.A: Thugentheihna, Biakpiaktheihna, Kikaihkhoptheihna, Laigelh leh hawmtheihna, Kumpi tungah lungkimlohna gentheih/pulaktheihna

N7.Q: Gamki-ukna Thukhunpi bangzah vei kipuahpha ta hiam?

N8.A: (Great Britain te kiangpan) suahtak tangkona, - (Great Britain te kiangpan) suahtak pulakkhia, (Great Britain te kiangpan) Americante (United States) suakta hi ei cihkhiatna

N9.Q: Suahtakna Thutangkopi in hong phal hamphatna thunihte bang a hia?
N9.A: Nuntak khuasakna, Kiphalna, Nopsak banga zontheihna

N10.A: Biakna khat peuhpeuh ah na utleh biathei/bialothei lel a omna

N11.Q: United States ah kizang neih-le-lam,silh-le-teen khantohna (sipuazi paizia) ah bangdan in pai hiam?
N11.A: Aziansian sanit (Sumneite bulphuh) paizia, - Sumzuaknamun thupitsakna (Zaykuat sipuazi)

N12.Q: Upadi tawh ki-uk cih bang hiam?
N12.A: Mikim in upadi zui/mang ding, Makaite in zong upadi zui/mang ding, Kumpi in zong upadi zui/mang ding, Kuamahpeuh upadi huamkhakloh omtuansaklo ding
